text: Are you upgrading to a new Mac
and want to bring your homebrew setup with you?
Learn how to back up and restore
all your homebrew packages effortlessly using a brew file.
This guide walks you through exporting from your old Mac
and importing to your new one,
and saving you hours of manual work.
Interested in making your move seamless?
Dive into the full article for step-by-step guidance.
